mapper.select: SELECT CP_NAME AS '회사이름', CAR_NAME AS '자동차이름', DATE_YEAR AS '연식', COUNT(`OPTION`) AS '옵션 갯수' FROM CAR_INFO CI INNER JOIN CAR_INFO_OPTIONS COP ON CI.CI_PK = COP.CI_FK INNER JOIN COMPANY CP ON CP.CP_PK = CI.CP_FK INNER JOIN CAR_NAME CN ON CN.CN_PK = CI.CN_FK INNER JOIN MODEL_YEAR MY ON MY.YEAR_PK = CI.YEAR_FK INNER JOIN OPTIONS OP ON OP.OP_PK = COP.OP_FK GROUP BY CP.CP_PK, CN.CN_PK, MY.YEAR_PK, CI.CI_PK;
